price: TiRẹ̀ ni àwọn tó wà nínú àwọn sánmọ̀ àti ilẹ̀. Àti pé àwọn tó ń bẹ lọ́dọ̀ Rẹ̀, wọn kì í ṣègbéraga níbi ìjọ́sìn Rẹ̀. Kò sì rẹ̀ wọ́n.
arabic: وَلَهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَمَنۡ عِندَهُۥ لَا يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ عَنۡ عِبَادَتِهِۦ وَلَا يَسۡتَحۡسِرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walahu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi waman ʿindahu lā yastakbirūna ʿan ʿibādatihi walā yastaḥsirūna
